.ad-email {
	display:none !important;
}

.oht-menu-container.oht-menu-container--utility.desktop-only, .oht-menu-container.oht-menu-container--utility.desktop-only a, .oht-menu-container.oht-menu-container--utility.desktop-only li, .oht-menu-container.oht-menu-container--utility.desktop-only .sub-menu {

}

	background-color:#004280;
	border-left:1px white solid;
	border-right:1px white solid;
	border-bottom:1px white solid;
}

.oht-menu-container--main .desktop-only ul, .oht-menu-container--main .desktop-only ul li, .oht-menu-container--main .desktop-only ul a, body.oht-nav-fixed {
	z-index: -1 !important;
}

	z-index:1 !important;
}

	color:white !Important;
}

}

	column-count:2;
}
*/
.oht-article {
	border-bottom: 1px solid #ececec;
	padding-bottom:7px;
	margin:0 0 14px;
}

.wp-caption-text {
	text-align:left;
	font-style:italic;
	color:gray;
	font-size:13px !important;
}

.oht-title-link {
	font-size:23px !important;
	font-weight:300 !important;
}

.header__logo {
	width:90% !important;
}

.primary-menu {
	z-index:1 !important;
}

.oht-menu-container.oht-menu-container--main.desktop-only {
	text-transform:uppercase;
	font-weight:bold;
}

.dfw-unit {
	text-align:center;
	margin-bottom:1em !important;
	margin-top:1em !important;
}

.dfw-unit.display-block::before {		
	display:none !important;
}

.oht-ads-widget-container img {
	padding-bottom:1em;}

h2.widget-title {
	padding: 5px 0 !important;
	border-bottom:solid 1pt #89ABE3;
	color:black;
}

.oht-article p {
line-height:1.75em !important;
	font-size:1rem;
}
.widget-title, .widget-title a {
	color:black !important;
	text-transform:uppercase;
}

.site-deets {
	display:none;
}

ul#menu-footer-menu li {
	float:right;
	list-style:none;
	padding:0 15px;
}

ul#menu-footer-menu {
	margin:0;}

.oht-trending__thumb {
	background-size:cover !important;
	background-position-x:50%;
}

#awesome-weather-rutland-us{
	margin-bottom:1.5em;
}

aside#rfw-id{
	margin-top:1.5em;
}

.oht-slider--special .oht-slide-content {
	background-position-y:0%;}

.oht-article {
	background-position-y:20% !important;}

span.author__by, .byline__on, .byline__by {
	display:none !important;}

ul#menu-navigation-menu {
	background:black !important;}

#menu-navigation-menu a  { 
	font-size:1em !important;}

.oht-ad-text {
	height:auto !important;
}

ul#menu-main-menu a {
	font-size:1.12em;
margin:.15em 0 !important;
}


.LegacyWidget_RecentObituaries .ObituaryTile .ObituaryImage {
	width:6em;}

 .article__bylinea {
font-size: 14px !important;
line-height:1.5;
font-style:italic;
}

.oht-article-meta {
font-size: 12px !important;
line-height:1.5;
font-style:italic;
}

.oht__content a {
	font: 22px/25px "palatino linotype",palatino,"times new 	roman",times,serif;
	font-weight:bold;
}

.oht-title-link, .oht-title-link a,  {
	font: 22px/25px "palatino linotype",palatino,"times new 	roman",times,serif;
}

.article__heading {
	font: 40px "palatino linotype",palatino,"times new 	roman",times,serif;
		}

button.dropdown-toggle {
	color:white;}

.geodir-breadcrumb.clearfix {display:none;}

.entry-content p {
	line-height:1.75em !important;
	font-size:1rem;
}

#reply-title {
	border-top:5px black solid;
	padding-top:1em;
	color:black;
}

label[for="comment"] {
	text-transform:uppercase;
	color:gray;
}

@media (min-width: 911px) {

#menu-navigation-menu {
	width:100%;
	position:fixed;
	z-index:999999;
	top:0;
	left:0;
	padding-left:2em;
	background-color:black;
	text-transform:uppercase;
}

	text-transform:uppercase;
	font-weight:bold;
}

	color:white !important;
}

	margin-top:2%;
}

}

@media (max-width: 910px) {

	width:100% !important;
}

}

	text-shadow:none;

<div class="oht-widget oht-widget--articles" id="oht_articles_widget-10"><h2 class="widget-title"><a href="https://www.rutlandherald.com/category/opinion/letters/">Letters</a></h2><div class="fat-stacks oht-article-widget__content oht-6-count"><div class="oht-article"><h3><a class="oht-title-link" href="https://www.rutlandherald.com/articles/make-trails-accessible/">Make trails accessible</a></h3><p class="oht-article-meta" style="display: block !important;">Rutland Herald | December 1, 2017</p><p style="font-size: inherit; line-height: inherit;">It seems to me that land owner closure of snowmobile trails has been taking place at an increased rate over the past years as people buy up property and do<a href="https://www.rutlandherald.com/articles/make-trails-accessible/">...</a></p></div><div class="oht-article"><h3><a class="oht-title-link" href="https://www.rutlandherald.com/articles/tell-me-your-story-schools-debate-should-be-shared/">Tell me your story: Schools debate should be shared</a></h3><p class="oht-article-meta" style="display: block !important;">Rutland Herald | November 30, 2017</p><p style="font-size: inherit; line-height: inherit;">We all have a story to tell.  Please tell me your story.  I’ll keep it in mind, I’ll hold it close, when I’m seated next to you at the next<a href="https://www.rutlandherald.com/articles/tell-me-your-story-schools-debate-should-be-shared/">...</a></p></div><div class="oht-article"><h3><a class="oht-title-link" href="https://www.rutlandherald.com/articles/our-teachers-deserve-better/">Our teachers deserve better</a></h3><p class="oht-article-meta" style="display: block !important;">Rutland Herald | November 30, 2017</p><p style="font-size: inherit; line-height: inherit;">As a veteran public high school teacher, I am discouraged by Dave Younce’s response to Charles Laramie’s commentary of Nov. 4. I do not know Mr. Laramie personally but, through<a href="https://www.rutlandherald.com/articles/our-teachers-deserve-better/">...</a></p></div><div class="oht-article"><h3><a class="oht-title-link" href="https://www.rutlandherald.com/articles/think-twice-about-the-rink/">Think twice about the rink</a></h3><p class="oht-article-meta" style="display: block !important;">Rutland Herald | November 30, 2017</p><p style="font-size: inherit; line-height: inherit;">We read the article on the front page of this weekend’s Rutland Herald about the Capitol Complex Commission deciding that the ice rink on the State House lawn did not<a href="https://www.rutlandherald.com/articles/think-twice-about-the-rink/">...</a></p></div><div class="oht-article"><h3><a class="oht-title-link" href="https://www.rutlandherald.com/articles/scott-made-crisis-worse/">Scott made crisis worse</a></h3><p class="oht-article-meta" style="display: block !important;">Rutland Herald | November 30, 2017</p><p style="font-size: inherit; line-height: inherit;">The education funding crisis is Governor Scott’s responsibility. Whatever happened to those enticing promises he made about solving the education financing crises? That $26 million? It looks like he made<a href="https://www.rutlandherald.com/articles/scott-made-crisis-worse/">...</a></p></div><div class="oht-article"><h3><a class="oht-title-link" href="https://www.rutlandherald.com/articles/critics-seek-safety-from-ideas/">Critics seek safety from ideas</a></h3><p class="oht-article-meta" style="display: block !important;">Rutland Herald | November 24, 2017</p><p style="font-size: inherit; line-height: inherit;">I find it fascinating how the people who harp on the Herald for its supposedly overwhelming leftwards lean conveniently remain silent when an oped by John McLaughry is featured in<a href="https://www.rutlandherald.com/articles/critics-seek-safety-from-ideas/">...</a></p></div></div></div><div class="oht-widget oht-widget--articles" id="oht_articles_widget-16"><h2 class="widget-title"><a href="https://www.rutlandherald.com/category/opinion/commentary/">Commentary</a></h2><div class="fat-stacks oht-article-widget__content oht-5-count"><div class="oht-article"><h3><a class="oht-title-link" href="https://www.rutlandherald.com/articles/are-we-headed-for-a-new-korean-war/">Are we headed for a new Korean War?</a></h3><p class="oht-article-meta" style="display: block !important;">Rutland Herald | December 1, 2017</p><p style="font-size: inherit; line-height: inherit;">I f there was a message in North Korea’s launch of a new missile capable of reaching anywhere in the United States, it was that America’s strategy toward that country<a href="https://www.rutlandherald.com/articles/are-we-headed-for-a-new-korean-war/">...</a></p></div><div class="oht-article"><h3><a class="oht-title-link" href="https://www.rutlandherald.com/articles/together-stronger/">Together, stronger</a></h3><p class="oht-article-meta" style="display: block !important;">Rutland Herald | November 30, 2017</p><p style="font-size: inherit; line-height: inherit;">As I ponder the situation that our district/ communities are facing this budget season, I know there are many of us that find ourselves questioning what is best. First of<a href="https://www.rutlandherald.com/articles/together-stronger/">...</a></p></div><div class="oht-article"><h3><a class="oht-title-link" href="https://www.rutlandherald.com/articles/biggest-tax-scam-ever/">Biggest tax scam ever</a></h3><p class="oht-article-meta" style="display: block !important;">Rutland Herald | November 29, 2017</p><p style="font-size: inherit; line-height: inherit;">Donald Trump likes to declare that every good thing that happens while he’s in office — job growth, rising stock prices, whatever — is the biggest, greatest, best ever. Then<a href="https://www.rutlandherald.com/articles/biggest-tax-scam-ever/">...</a></p></div><div class="oht-article"><h3><a class="oht-title-link" href="https://www.rutlandherald.com/articles/glory-days/">Glory Days</a></h3><p class="oht-article-meta" style="display: block !important;">Rutland Herald | November 29, 2017</p><p style="font-size: inherit; line-height: inherit;">I was sitting in the parked car for what seemed like an eternity. I checked the address on the piece of paper the man gave me for the 20th time.<a href="https://www.rutlandherald.com/articles/glory-days/">...</a></p></div><div class="oht-article"><h3><a class="oht-title-link" href="https://www.rutlandherald.com/articles/will-senators-honor-principles/">Will senators honor principles?</a></h3><p class="oht-article-meta" style="display: block !important;">Rutland Herald | November 28, 2017</p><p style="font-size: inherit; line-height: inherit;">A small number of Republicans — fewer than 10 — will probably determine the fate of the Trump tax plan. 				if (jQuery('.search_by_post', $form).val() != '' && typeof gd_cpt_no_location == 'function') {
					if (gd_cpt_no_location(jQuery('.search_by_post', $form).val())) {
						jQuery('.snear', $form).remove();
						jQuery('.sgeo_lat', $form).remove();
						jQuery('.sgeo_lon', $form).remove();
						jQuery('select[name="sort_by"]', $form).remove();
						jQuery($form).submit();
						return;
					}
				}
				
				if (dist > 0 || (jQuery('select[name="sort_by"]').val() == 'nearest' || jQuery('select[name="sort_by"]', $form).val() == 'farthest') || (jQuery(".snear", $form).val() != '' && jQuery(".snear", $form).val() != 'Near')) {
					geodir_setsearch($form);
				} else {
					jQuery(".snear", $form).val('');
					jQuery($form).submit();
				}
			});
		}

        jQuery(document).ready(function() {
            geodir_setup_submit_search();
            //setup advanced search form on form ajax load
            jQuery("body").on("geodir_setup_search_form", function(){
                geodir_setup_submit_search();
            });
        });
        
		function geodir_setsearch($form) {
			if ((dist > 0 || (jQuery('select[name="sort_by"]', $form).val() == 'nearest' || jQuery('select[name="sort_by"]', $form).val() == 'farthest')) && (jQuery(".snear", $form).val() == '' || jQuery(".snear", $form).val() == 'Near')) jQuery(".snear", $form).val(default_location);
			geocodeAddress($form);
		}

        function updateSearchPosition(latLng, $form) {
            if (window.gdMaps === 'google') {
                jQuery('.sgeo_lat').val(latLng.lat());
                jQuery('.sgeo_lon').val(latLng.lng());
            } else if (window.gdMaps === 'osm') {
                jQuery('.sgeo_lat').val(latLng.lat);
                jQuery('.sgeo_lon').val(latLng.lon);
            }
            jQuery($form).submit(); // submit form after insering the lat long positions
        }

        function geocodeAddress($form) {
            // Call the geocode function
            Sgeocoder = window.gdMaps == 'google' ? new google.maps.Geocoder() : null;

            if (jQuery('.snear', $form).val() == '' || ( jQuery('.sgeo_lat').val() != '' && jQuery('.sgeo_lon').val() != ''  ) || jQuery('.snear', $form).val().match("^In:")) {
                if (jQuery('.snear', $form).val().match("^In:")) {
                    jQuery(".snear", $form).val('');
                }
                jQuery($form).submit();
            } else {
                var address = jQuery(".snear", $form).val();

                if (jQuery('.snear', $form).val() == 'Near') {
                    initialise2();
                } else {
                                        if (window.gdMaps === 'google') {
                        Sgeocoder.geocode({'address': address},
                            function (results, status) {
                                if (status == google.maps.GeocoderStatus.OK) {
                                    updateSearchPosition(results[0].geometry.location, $form);
                                } else {
                                    alert("Search was not successful for the following reason :" + status);
                                }
                            });
                    } else if (window.gdMaps === 'osm') {
                        geocodePositionOSM(false, address, false, false, 
                            function(geo) {
                                if (typeof geo !== 'undefined' && geo.lat && geo.lon) {
                                    updateSearchPosition(geo, $form);
                                } else {
                                    alert("Search was not successful for the requested address.");
                                }
                            });
                    } else {
                        jQuery($form).submit();
                    }
                }
            }
        }

        function initialise2() {
            if (!window.gdMaps) {
                return;
            }
            
            if (window.gdMaps === 'google') {
                var latlng = new google.maps.LatLng(56.494343, -4.205446);
                var myOptions = {
                    zoom: 4,
                    mapTypeId: google.maps.MapTypeId.TERRAIN,
                    disableDefaultUI: true
                }
            } else if (window.gdMaps === 'osm') {
                var latlng = new L.LatLng(56.494343, -4.205446);
                var myOptions = {
                    zoom: 4,
                    mapTypeId: 'TERRAIN',
                    disableDefaultUI: true
                }
            }
            try { prepareGeolocation(); } catch (e) {}
            doGeolocation();
        }

        function doGeolocation() {
            if (navigator.geolocation) {
                navigator.geolocation.getCurrentPosition(positionSuccess, positionError);
            } else {
                positionError(-1);
            }
        }

        function positionError(err) {
            var msg;
            switch (err.code) {
                case err.UNKNOWN_ERROR:
                    msg = "Unable to find your location";
                    break;
                case err.PERMISSION_DENINED:
                    msg = "Permission denied in finding your location";
                    break;
                case err.POSITION_UNAVAILABLE:
                    msg = "Your location is currently unknown";
                    break;
                case err.BREAK:
                    msg = "Attempt to find location took too long";
                    break;
                default:
                    msg = "Location detection not supported in browser";
            }
            jQuery('#info').html(msg);
        }

        function positionSuccess(position) {
            var coords = position.coords || position.coordinate || position;
            jQuery('.sgeo_lat').val(coords.latitude);
            jQuery('.sgeo_lon').val(coords.longitude);

            jQuery('.geodir-listing-search').submit();
        }

        /**
         * On unload page do some cleaning so back button cache does not store these values.
         */
        window.onunload = function(){
            if(jQuery('.sgeo_lat').length ){
                jQuery('.sgeo_lat').val('');
                jQuery('.sgeo_lon').val('');
            }
        };

    </script>

<script type="text/javascript">
        jQuery(document).ready(function () {
            jQuery('.geodir-bestof-cat-list a, #geodir_bestof_tab_dd').on("click change", function (e) {
                var widgetBox = jQuery(this).closest('.geodir_bestof_widget');
                var loading = jQuery(widgetBox).find("#geodir-bestof-loading");
                var container = jQuery(widgetBox).find('#geodir-bestof-places');

                jQuery(document).ajaxStart(function () {
                    //container.hide(); // Not working when more then one widget on page
                    //loading.show();
                }).ajaxStop(function () {
                    loading.hide();
                    container.fadeIn('slow');
                });

                e.preventDefault();

                var activeTab = jQuery(this).closest('dl').find('dd.geodir-tab-active');
                activeTab.removeClass('geodir-tab-active');
                jQuery(this).parent().addClass('geodir-tab-active');

                var term_id = 0;
                if (e.type === "change") {
                    term_id = jQuery(this).val();
                } else if (e.type === "click") {
                    term_id = jQuery(this).attr('data-termid');
                }

                var post_type = jQuery(widgetBox).find('#bestof_widget_post_type').val();
                var excerpt_type = jQuery(widgetBox).find('#bestof_widget_excerpt_type').val();
                var post_limit = jQuery(widgetBox).find('#bestof_widget_post_limit').val();
                var taxonomy = jQuery(widgetBox).find('#bestof_widget_taxonomy').val();
                var char_count = jQuery(widgetBox).find('#bestof_widget_char_count').val();
                var add_location_filter = jQuery(widgetBox).find('#bestof_widget_location_filter').val();

                var data = {
                    'action': 'geodir_bestof',
                    'geodir_bestof_nonce': 'eff6b89a5c',
                    'post_type': post_type,
                    'excerpt_type': excerpt_type,
                    'post_limit': post_limit,
                    'taxonomy': taxonomy,
                    'geodir_ajax': true,
                    'term_id': term_id,
                    'char_count': char_count,
                    'add_location_filter': add_location_filter
                };

                container.hide();
                loading.show();

                jQuery.post(geodir_var.geodir_ajax_url, data, function (response) {
                    container.html(response);
                    jQuery(widgetBox).find('.geodir_category_list_view li .geodir-post-img .geodir_thumbnail img').css('display', 'block');

                    // start lazy load if it's turned on
                    if(geodir_var.geodir_lazy_load==1){
                        geodir_init_lazy_load();
                    }

                });
            })
        });
        jQuery(document).ready(function () {
            if (jQuery(window).width() < 660) {
                if (jQuery('.bestof-widget-tab-layout').hasClass('bestof-tabs-on-left')) {
                    jQuery('.bestof-widget-tab-layout').removeClass('bestof-tabs-on-left').addClass('bestof-tabs-as-dropdown');
                } else if (jQuery('.bestof-widget-tab-layout').hasClass('bestof-tabs-on-top')) {
                    jQuery('.bestof-widget-tab-layout').removeClass('bestof-tabs-on-top').addClass('bestof-tabs-as-dropdown');
                }
            }
        });
    </script>

Water Shut-off

Carl Baker, City of Newton Water Department

Scituate's Peggotty Beach closed, all others open

Thursday
Aug 21, 2014 at 12:01 AM Aug 21, 2014 at 12:49 PM

Peggotty Beach in Scituate was closed as a precaution on Wednesday after four of the previous five rounds of testing showed unacceptable bacteria levels.

The water tested clean on Wednesday. The beach would likely reopen if samples taken today show low bacteria counts.

The other 60 salt-water beaches on the South Shore are open.

See water quality test results for each community and for Cape Cod, the South Coast and North Shore.

For more on Quincy beaches,  call 617-376-1288, or visit ledger-quincy-beaches. For more on Wollaston  Beach, call 617-626-4972.

HOW BEACHES ARE TESTED

Beaches are tested for intestinal bacteria found in humans and animals.

High levels indicate the possible presence of disease-causing microbes that are present in sewage but are more difficult to detect. Bacterial colonies are filtered from three ounces of water and placed on a gel infused with nutrients and chemicals designed to promote growth.

Left in an incubator, the single cells isolated on the filter grow explosively, forming colonies visible to the naked eye. After one day, the colonies are counted and if they exceed 104 colonies, the beach is closed to swimming.

    Beaches closed after treated sewage spilled into Boardman Lake

    by Mara Thompson

    Wednesday night an equipment failure at the Traverse City Regional Sewage Treatment Facility led to sludge spilling into Boardman Lake, and caused several beaches to close Thursday.

    Thu, 21 Aug 2014 23:34:41 GMT — 

    Several beaches were closed Thursday, after an equipment failure at the Traverse City Regional Sewage Treatment Facility led to sludge spilling into Boardman Lake on Wednesday.

    They originally estimated that 200 gallons of treated waste spilled into Boardman Lake, but after more investigation they found it to be much less.

    About 42 hundred gallons of sludge spilled out from the plant after a pump failed and about 20 gallons made it into Boardman Lake.

    â??For the size of the Boardman Lake and to see that we put 20 gallons of bio solids into it, it would be pretty dilute,â?? said OMI Project Manager Casey Rose. â??We are discharging 4.5 million gallons of treated water every day so even 20 gallons compared to that is very dilute.â??

    But as a precaution, the north part of Boardman Lake, the lower part of Boardman River, and Clinch Park to Bryant Park were closed today.

    â??The one day that we come here that I want to swim in your beautiful lake here we cannot,â?? said Nina Roedding of East Detroit. â??So it's a great disappointment but you know, this happens and you just move on and you go to plan B.â??

    But it wasn't just swimmers who had to change their plans.

    â??We've been waiting on good weather for forever and the most beautiful morning of the entire year was today and we're shutdown,â?? said The River Owner Michael Sutherland.



    The River rents kayaks and had to turn many customers away due to the spill.

    â??Our number one trip is from Hull Park to Clinch Park so that's exactly the area that was affected by the spill, so that's not happening today for us,â?? said Sutherland.

    But Rose said the situation could have been a lot worst.

    â??Luckily we had a quick response time,â?? said Rose. â??We were able to follow protocol and minimize risk to the public and the environment.â??



    Technicians ran tests on the water in Boardman Lake and Boardman River Wednesday. The results take 24 hours, and will tell whether it is safe to swim.

    The Grand Traverse County Health Department says that drinking water for the city is not affected by the spill because drinking water comes from East Grand Traverse Bay.

        Concord teacher to be honored</a></h3>
</div>
<div class="card-lead">
<p>A Concord West Side Elementary School teacher will be recognized Saturday during halftime of the Big Ten Football Championship in Indianapolis for a project she and her students developed to help reduce waste and improve efficiency within the school’s drinking water system.</p>

<div class="card-body">
<div class="card-headline">
<h3 class="">
<a href="/sports/national_sports/men-s-basketball-no-michigan-state-beats-no-notre-dame/article_49fd8338-467f-579d-8947-cb19d6fb8b1a.html">
        

        
        MEN'S BASKETBALL: No. 3 Michigan State beats No. 5 Notre Dame</a></h3>
</div>
<div class="card-lead">
<p>EAST LANSING, Mich. — Joshua Langford scored 12 of his 17 points in the first half to help No. 3 Michigan State take a huge lead it was able to restore in the second half against No. 5 Notre Dame in an 81-63 victory Thursday night. </p>

<div class="asset-content subscriber-premium" itemprop="articleBody">
<p xmlns="http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd">South Ninth Street, between East Jackson and Franklin streets in Goshen, is under a boil water order from noon until further notice.</p><p xmlns="http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd">From noon until 4 p.m., Goshen utility crew will be performing a scheduled water main shutdown to install a new water main.</p><p xmlns="http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd">The Indiana Department of Environmental Management requires the water utility to issue a boil order for the affected area.</p>
<div data-tnt-ads-tmp='{"vendor":"blox","type":"region","region":"fixed-big-ad-top-asset","id":"fixed-big-ad-top-asset","pos":"fixed-big-ad-top-asset, atf","fold":"above","include_domain":"cnhi\/goshennews","size":"[300,250]","height":"250","width":"300","mobile":false,"js":{"video":"https:\/\/bloximages.chicago2.vip.townnews.com\/goshennews.com\/shared-content\/art\/tncms\/templates\/libraries\/flex\/components\/video\/resources\/scripts\/video.512a6903eae08e033c76afdce2a0eac7.js"},"overline":null,"index_slug":null,"url":"\/news"}' style="display:none;"></div>
<div data-refreshable="true" data-region="fixed-big-ad-top-asset">
</div><div class="tncms-region hidden-print" id="tncms-region-article_instory_top"></div><p xmlns="http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd">After the water main is installed, water samples will be taken and analyzed for the presence of bacteria. If two consecutive tests pass, the boil order will be lifted. Notice of the boil order cancellation will be distributed to customers through a customer flier and through The Goshen News.</p><p xmlns="http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd">For more information or to report specific service concerns, call Mindy Kyle at the Goshen Water Department at 534-5306.</p><p xmlns="http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd">City water within the affected should not be consumed without boiling it for at least 5 minutes. The water remains safe for bathing, laundry and restroom facilities.</p>
<div data-tnt-ads-tmp='{"vendor":"blox","type":"region","region":"fixed-big-ad-middle-asset","id":"fixed-big-ad-middle-asset","pos":"fixed-big-ad-middle-asset, stf","fold":"span","include_domain":"cnhi\/goshennews","size":"[300,250]","height":"250","width":"300","mobile":false,"js":{"video":"https:\/\/bloximages.chicago2.vip.townnews.com\/goshennews.com\/shared-content\/art\/tncms\/templates\/libraries\/flex\/components\/video\/resources\/scripts\/video.512a6903eae08e033c76afdce2a0eac7.js"},"overline":null,"index_slug":null,"url":"\/news"}' style="display:none;"></div>

                var $tempRegion = $('<div id="asset_side_sticky-placeholder"></div>');

                        setTimeout(function(){
                            var iFixPoint = $region.offset().top - 30;

                            if (iCurPoint < $tempRegion.offset().top - 30) {
                                $region.css('top', null);
                                $region.removeClass('affix');
                                $region.removeClass('affix-bottom');

                                __tnt.elementOnScreen('#infinite-container') ||

                            ) {

                                $region.removeClass('affix-bottom');
                            }
                            bThrottle = false;
                        }, 25);
                    }

<script id="json-ld" type="application/ld+json">{
    "@context": "http:\/\/schema.org",
    "url": "http:\/\/www.wcvb.com\/article\/wellesley-residents-told-to-boil-water\/8206914",
    "name": "Wellesley residents told to boil water",
    "headline": "Wellesley residents told to boil water",
    "articleBody": "Wellesley residents were told Thursday afternoon to boil their water before using it after testing found contamination, the state Department of Environmental Protection said.Watch the reportThe order was given after testing found E.coli and coliform bacteria in the town's water supply.\u00a0 The boil-water order applied to the entire Wellesley water system, and will likely be in place through the weekend.\"While we believe at this time that the potential health risk is relatively small, we take any contamination threat seriously,\" a statement from the town said.Residents were advised to boil water for at least one minute before using it or to use bottled water.Babson College, which is located in Wellesley, advised its students and staff to use bottled water.Wellesley has a population of approximately 28,000 residents and many businesses and restaurants.",
    "datePublished": "2014-08-21T17:15:59Z",
    "dateModified": "2017-10-05T04:31:34.303985Z",

</div>

</div>

<div class="article-content--body-inner">
<div class="mobile">
<!-- article/blocks/headline -->
<section class="article-headline">
<div class="article-headline--title">Wellesley residents told to boil water</div>
<div class="article-headline--subheadline">E. coli, coliform contamination found</div>
<div class="article-social-branding share-content horizontal">

<!-- /article/blocks/headline -->
<!-- article/blocks/byline -->
<div class="article-authors">
</div>
<!-- /article/blocks/byline -->
</div>
<div class="article-content--body-teaser">
</div>
<div class="article-content--body-text">
<strong class="dateline">WELLESLEY, Mass. —</strong> <p>Wellesley residents were told Thursday afternoon to boil their water before using it after testing found contamination, the state Department of Environmental Protection said.</p><p><a href="http://www.wcvb.com/news/wellesley-boil-water-order-could-be-in-effect-until-saturday/27672474" target="_blank">Watch the report</a></p><div class="article-content--body-wrapper-side-floater ">
<!-- blocks/ad.twig -->
<div class="ad-rectangle ">
<div class="ad-container or-halfpage" data-loc="btf" data-type="rectangle"></div>
<div class="ad-label">Advertisement</div>
</div>
<!-- blocks/ad.twig -->
</div>
<p>The order was given after testing found E.coli and coliform bacteria in the town's water supply.  The boil-water order applied to the entire Wellesley water system, and will likely be in place through the weekend.</p><p>"While we believe at this time that the potential health risk is relatively small, we take any contamination threat seriously," a statement from the town said.</p><p>Residents were advised to boil water for at least one minute before using it or to use bottled water.</p><p>Babson College, which is located in Wellesley, advised its students and staff to use bottled water.</p><p>Wellesley has a population of approximately 28,000 residents and many businesses and restaurants.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="article-content--footer">
</div>
</div>
<!-- /article/blocks/content -->

        var default_location = 'Rutland';
        var latlng;
        var address;
        var dist = 0;
        var Sgeocoder = (typeof google!=='undefined' && typeof google.maps!=='undefined') ? new google.maps.Geocoder() : {};

		function geodir_setup_submit_search() {
            jQuery('.geodir_submit_search').unbind('click');// unbind any other click events
			jQuery('.geodir_submit_search').click(function(e) {

                e.preventDefault();

				var s = ' ';
				var $form = jQuery(this).closest('form');

				if (jQuery("#sdist input[type='radio']:checked").length != 0) dist = jQuery("#sdist input[type='radio']:checked").val();
				if (jQuery('.search_text', $form).val() == '' || jQuery('.search_text', $form).val() == 'Search for') jQuery('.search_text', $form).val(s);
				
				// Disable location based search for disabled location post type.
				if (jQuery('.search_by_post', $form).val() != '' && typeof gd_cpt_no_location == 'function') {
					if (gd_cpt_no_location(jQuery('.search_by_post', $form).val())) {
						jQuery('.snear', $form).remove();
						jQuery('.sgeo_lat', $form).remove();
						jQuery('.sgeo_lon', $form).remove();
						jQuery('select[name="sort_by"]', $form).remove();
						jQuery($form).submit();
						return;
					}
				}
				
				if (dist > 0 || (jQuery('select[name="sort_by"]').val() == 'nearest' || jQuery('select[name="sort_by"]', $form).val() == 'farthest') || (jQuery(".snear", $form).val() != '' && jQuery(".snear", $form).val() != 'Near')) {
					geodir_setsearch($form);
				} else {
					jQuery(".snear", $form).val('');
					jQuery($form).submit();
				}
			});
		}

        jQuery(document).ready(function() {
            geodir_setup_submit_search();
            //setup advanced search form on form ajax load
            jQuery("body").on("geodir_setup_search_form", function(){
                geodir_setup_submit_search();
            });
        });
        
		function geodir_setsearch($form) {
			if ((dist > 0 || (jQuery('select[name="sort_by"]', $form).val() == 'nearest' || jQuery('select[name="sort_by"]', $form).val() == 'farthest')) && (jQuery(".snear", $form).val() == '' || jQuery(".snear", $form).val() == 'Near')) jQuery(".snear", $form).val(default_location);
			geocodeAddress($form);
		}

        function updateSearchPosition(latLng, $form) {
            if (window.gdMaps === 'google') {
                jQuery('.sgeo_lat').val(latLng.lat());
                jQuery('.sgeo_lon').val(latLng.lng());
            } else if (window.gdMaps === 'osm') {
                jQuery('.sgeo_lat').val(latLng.lat);
                jQuery('.sgeo_lon').val(latLng.lon);
            }
            jQuery($form).submit(); // submit form after insering the lat long positions
        }

        function geocodeAddress($form) {
            // Call the geocode function
            Sgeocoder = window.gdMaps == 'google' ? new google.maps.Geocoder() : null;

            if (jQuery('.snear', $form).val() == '' || ( jQuery('.sgeo_lat').val() != '' && jQuery('.sgeo_lon').val() != ''  ) || jQuery('.snear', $form).val().match("^In:")) {
                if (jQuery('.snear', $form).val().match("^In:")) {
                    jQuery(".snear", $form).val('');
                }
                jQuery($form).submit();
            } else {
                var address = jQuery(".snear", $form).val();

                if (jQuery('.snear', $form).val() == 'Near') {
                    initialise2();
                } else {
                                        if (window.gdMaps === 'google') {
                        Sgeocoder.geocode({'address': address},
                            function (results, status) {
                                if (status == google.maps.GeocoderStatus.OK) {
                                    updateSearchPosition(results[0].geometry.location, $form);
                                } else {
                                    alert("Search was not successful for the following reason :" + status);
                                }
                            });
                    } else if (window.gdMaps === 'osm') {
                        geocodePositionOSM(false, address, false, false, 
                            function(geo) {
                                if (typeof geo !== 'undefined' && geo.lat && geo.lon) {
                                    updateSearchPosition(geo, $form);
                                } else {
                                    alert("Search was not successful for the requested address.");
                                }
                            });
                    } else {
                        jQuery($form).submit();
                    }
                }
            }
        }

        function initialise2() {
            if (!window.gdMaps) {
                return;
            }
            
            if (window.gdMaps === 'google') {
                var latlng = new google.maps.LatLng(56.494343, -4.205446);
                var myOptions = {
                    zoom: 4,
                    mapTypeId: google.maps.MapTypeId.TERRAIN,
                    disableDefaultUI: true
                }
            } else if (window.gdMaps === 'osm') {
                var latlng = new L.LatLng(56.494343, -4.205446);
                var myOptions = {
                    zoom: 4,
                    mapTypeId: 'TERRAIN',
                    disableDefaultUI: true
                }
            }
            try { prepareGeolocation(); } catch (e) {}
            doGeolocation();
        }

        function doGeolocation() {
            if (navigator.geolocation) {
                navigator.geolocation.getCurrentPosition(positionSuccess, positionError);
            } else {
                positionError(-1);
            }
        }

        function positionError(err) {
            var msg;
            switch (err.code) {
                case err.UNKNOWN_ERROR:
                    msg = "Unable to find your location";
                    break;
                case err.PERMISSION_DENINED:
                    msg = "Permission denied in finding your location";
                    break;
                case err.POSITION_UNAVAILABLE:
                    msg = "Your location is currently unknown";
                    break;
                case err.BREAK:
                    msg = "Attempt to find location took too long";
                    break;
                default:
                    msg = "Location detection not supported in browser";
            }
            jQuery('#info').html(msg);
        }

        function positionSuccess(position) {
            var coords = position.coords || position.coordinate || position;
            jQuery('.sgeo_lat').val(coords.latitude);
            jQuery('.sgeo_lon').val(coords.longitude);

            jQuery('.geodir-listing-search').submit();
        }

        /**
         * On unload page do some cleaning so back button cache does not store these values.
         */
        window.onunload = function(){
            if(jQuery('.sgeo_lat').length ){
                jQuery('.sgeo_lat').val('');
                jQuery('.sgeo_lon').val('');
            }
        };

    </script>

<script type="text/javascript">
        jQuery(document).ready(function () {
            jQuery('.geodir-bestof-cat-list a, #geodir_bestof_tab_dd').on("click change", function (e) {
                var widgetBox = jQuery(this).closest('.geodir_bestof_widget');
                var loading = jQuery(widgetBox).find("#geodir-bestof-loading");
                var container = jQuery(widgetBox).find('#geodir-bestof-places');

                jQuery(document).ajaxStart(function () {
                    //container.hide(); // Not working when more then one widget on page
                    //loading.show();
                }).ajaxStop(function () {
                    loading.hide();
                    container.fadeIn('slow');
                });

                e.preventDefault();

                var activeTab = jQuery(this).closest('dl').find('dd.geodir-tab-active');
                activeTab.removeClass('geodir-tab-active');
                jQuery(this).parent().addClass('geodir-tab-active');

                var term_id = 0;
                if (e.type === "change") {
                    term_id = jQuery(this).val();
                } else if (e.type === "click") {
                    term_id = jQuery(this).attr('data-termid');
                }

                var post_type = jQuery(widgetBox).find('#bestof_widget_post_type').val();
                var excerpt_type = jQuery(widgetBox).find('#bestof_widget_excerpt_type').val();
                var post_limit = jQuery(widgetBox).find('#bestof_widget_post_limit').val();
                var taxonomy = jQuery(widgetBox).find('#bestof_widget_taxonomy').val();
                var char_count = jQuery(widgetBox).find('#bestof_widget_char_count').val();
                var add_location_filter = jQuery(widgetBox).find('#bestof_widget_location_filter').val();

                var data = {
                    'action': 'geodir_bestof',
                    'geodir_bestof_nonce': 'eff6b89a5c',
                    'post_type': post_type,
                    'excerpt_type': excerpt_type,
                    'post_limit': post_limit,
                    'taxonomy': taxonomy,
                    'geodir_ajax': true,
                    'term_id': term_id,
                    'char_count': char_count,
                    'add_location_filter': add_location_filter
                };

                container.hide();
                loading.show();

                jQuery.post(geodir_var.geodir_ajax_url, data, function (response) {
                    container.html(response);
                    jQuery(widgetBox).find('.geodir_category_list_view li .geodir-post-img .geodir_thumbnail img').css('display', 'block');

                    // start lazy load if it's turned on
                    if(geodir_var.geodir_lazy_load==1){
                        geodir_init_lazy_load();
                    }

                });
            })
        });
        jQuery(document).ready(function () {
            if (jQuery(window).width() < 660) {
                if (jQuery('.bestof-widget-tab-layout').hasClass('bestof-tabs-on-left')) {
                    jQuery('.bestof-widget-tab-layout').removeClass('bestof-tabs-on-left').addClass('bestof-tabs-as-dropdown');
                } else if (jQuery('.bestof-widget-tab-layout').hasClass('bestof-tabs-on-top')) {
                    jQuery('.bestof-widget-tab-layout').removeClass('bestof-tabs-on-top').addClass('bestof-tabs-as-dropdown');
                }
            }
        });
    </script>

Boil water order posted in Annsville

Published Aug 20, 2014 at 4:00pm

TOWN OF ANNSVILLE — A precautionary boil-water notice is in effect for some areas in the town that lost water service Tuesday, the City of Oneida Water Department announced.

Areas covered by the notice, expected to be in effect until Friday, include Amos Trailer Park, Collins Trailer Park, Leisure Village (Martin Court), Taberg Water District 75 (Matt & Sarah Drive), and residents serviced on Lee Center-Taberg Road.

The notice specifies “Do not drink the water without boiling it first.”

The notice is due to a loss of pressure as part of difficulties in connecting a new main to the existing main as part of the Fish Creek Crossing Project, according to the water department. The notice is being issued until testing can be conducted to ensure the water is safe to drink, the department said.

Those in the affected areas should bring water to a boil, let it boil for one minute, and let it cool before using, or use bottled water, the department said. Boiled or bottled water should be used for drinking, making ice, brushing teeth, washing dishes, and food preparation until further notice.

The notice is only a precaution to ensure the water is safe to drink, the department said. No contamination has been detected. People are advised to call the City of Oneida Water Department at 363-1490 or the Oneida County Health Department at 798-5064 if they have questions.
